page.title: 19Alec Jarrett Limited
page.content: Alec Jarrett Ltd is a wholesale butchers and meat packers. The business is about 60 or more years old. It was on a different site for about 50 years or so and 10 years ago the only site in the area, was trasferred across to the High Street, to a new location. They employ approximatly 100-150 employees. Everyday in the summer 100-150 cows are killed, but in winter 200 are killed. 200 sheep are killed every Thursday and 80 pigs on Mondays and Thursdays. The annimals are first stunned electronically, or shot with special guns. Then their throats are slit. The animals are the frozen and packed for sale. Researchers H. Dane, V. Gale, D. Ruding, K. Workman and Mr.T. Hewitt
